metadata.title: CVE-2020-13170 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise did not appropriately enforce scopefor local tokens issued by a primary data center, where replication to asecondary data center was not enabled. Introduced in 1.4.0, fixed in 1.6.6and 1.7.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13170` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.7.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.4+dfsg1-1').
